item.title: [[2022-04-11 Intro Fellowship]] Message to Evelyn Regarding David, Kelvin, Kai, and Sonny
item.description: [[2022-04-11 Intro Fellowship]] Message to Evelyn Regarding David, Kelvin, Kai, and Sonny Hey Evelyn! I have four friends—David Peng, Kelvin Yip, Kai Xu, and Sonny Nguyen—who all have approached me and expressed interest in working at Emerge this summer in any capacity.
